recipes.title: Pasta with Tomato Sauce
directions: Boil water in a pot
Add pasta to boiling water
Cook pasta until al dente
Drain pasta
Add tomato sauce to pasta
Add olive oil and salt to pasta
Mix well and serve

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
directions: Heat skillet over medium heat
Butter one side of each slice of bread
Place one slice of bread, butter side down, in skillet
Add cheese on top of bread
Place second slice of bread, butter side up, on top of cheese
Cook until bread is golden brown
Flip sandwich and cook until second side is golden brown
Serve hot

recipes.title: Caesar Salad
directions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce
Add croutons and parmesan cheese to lettuce
Add caesar dressing to lettuce
Toss salad until well mixed
Serve cold

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees
Cream butter and sugar together
Add flour to butter and sugar mixture
Mix in chocolate chips
Scoop dough onto baking sheet
Bake for 10-12 minutes
Let cookies cool before serving

recipes.title: Chicken Stir Fry
directions: Cut chicken breast into bite-sized pieces
Heat oil in a wok or skillet
Add chicken to wok and cook until browned
Add vegetables to wok and cook until tender
Add soy sauce to wok and stir well
Serve hot over rice

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
directions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions
Cook bacon in a skillet until crispy
Whisk eggs and parmesan cheese together in a bowl
Drain spaghetti and add to skillet with bacon
Add egg and cheese mixture to skillet and stir well
Serve hot

recipes.title: Tacos
directions: Cook ground beef in a skillet
Add taco seasoning and water to skillet
Simmer until beef is cooked through
Warm tortillas in a skillet or microwave
Fill tortillas with beef and desired toppings
Serve hot

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees
Coat chicken breast in bread crumbs
Bake chicken in oven until cooked through
Top chicken with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese
Bake until cheese is melted and bubbly
Serve hot over pasta

recipes.title: Beef Stew
directions: Cut beef into bite-sized pieces
Brown beef in a pot
Add vegetables to pot
Cover with water and simmer until beef is tender
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot
